thread.title: OECD Leading Indicators Point to Continued Slowdowns
thread.title_full: OECD Leading Indicators Point to Continued Slowdowns - WSJ

author: Paul Hannon
title: OECD Leading Indicators Point to Continued Slowdowns
text:
Growth is set to slow in each of the world’s three largest economies, according to leading indicators released Thursday by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development.
The Paris-based research body said its gauges of future economic activity—which are based on information available for August—point to slowdowns in the U.S., China and Japan, as well as the U.K. and Canada.
The leading indicators are the latest...
